transArray.content: The lobby was under renovation when I went there, and the first floor had a smell, but everything else was fine.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. We are very sorry that this stay did not bring you a more ideal stay experience. In line with our responsibility to provide guests with a more ideal stay environment, the room facilities and hotel lobby are being gradually updated. It is indeed our fault that has caused you some trouble before. We sincerely apologize to you again. We have basically returned to normal at present. . I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
